title: Mastering Sections and Columns
description: Learn how to create professional layouts using Elementor's Section and Column structure.

blocks.content: Sections and columns are the foundation of your Elementor layouts. Master these to create professional page structures.

Key layout concepts:

  • Section types and purposes
  • Column arrangements
  • Responsive layouts
  • Nested sections
  • Content width control

Available styling options:

  • Background types (color, image, video)
  • Shape dividers
  • Overlay effects
  • Padding and margin
  • Custom CSS
